slides.subtitle: Learn. Innovate. Excel.
slides.title: Welcome! Want to be an AI Expert?
slides.description: Our vision: To create AI experts in remote corners of India, with a focus on Punjab. We target school students and university graduates. So far, we've conducted live sessions for 50,000+ students. We are collaborating with Akal Academies to provide AI learning to 100+ schools across Punjab.

discussionSection.title: AI Discussion Topics
points: Can AI Replace Humans?
Data in AI: Collection & Ethics
AI vs Human Creativity
Python in Modern AI Workflows
Neural Network Use-Cases
discussionSection.description: Dive into these core questions to explore AI‚Äôs impact, capabilities, and ethical considerations.

impactSection.description: We're proud to empower learners and drive AI adoption across communities.

programDetailsSection.title: Intro to AI Program Details

points.point1: ‚úîÔ∏è The Intro to AI programs have a very nominal fee (free for several schools and with financial support available for students who need it).
points.point2: ‚úîÔ∏è Free for Punjab Government Schools, SGPC Schools, Akal Academies, GNDEC College, and SBSSTC University.
points.point4: ‚úîÔ∏è Designed for students in 8th grade and above. Introduces real-world AI skills and projects.
points.point5: ‚úîÔ∏è Bachelor‚Äôs and Master‚Äôs students are welcome to apply, especially those seeking real-world AI applications.

newBatch.title: AI Foundation Batch

instructor.title: Meet Your Instructor
instructor.name: Dr. Sandeep Singh Sandha
instructor.description: Dr. Sandeep Singh Sandha is an accomplished AI researcher and educator with a Ph.D. and Master's in Computer Science from UCLA, where he was honored as the commencement speaker for the Class of 2022. He earned his B.Tech from IIT Roorkee with first-class distinction.
instructor.subtitle: Innovator, Educator, and Visionary Leader in Advanced Technologies

expertise.title: Cutting-Edge AI Expertise & Global Tech Impact
points: 50+ research papers in top AI conferences like ICLR, NeurIPS ‚Äî trusted voice in AI research.
Collaborated with Yann LeCun (Meta's Chief AI Scientist, Turing Award winner) ‚Äî part of elite AI research circles.
Created Mango ML Library at ARM ‚Äî used to design CPUs in billions of smartphones (Samsung, iPhones).
Led GenAI team at Abacus AI ‚Äî built Dracarys-ver2, a model that outperforms ChatGPT-4o, Claude, Gemini in coding tasks.
Worked at Amazon, ARM, IBM, Oracle, Teradata ‚Äî deep exposure to both research and production-level AI systems.

teaching.title: Deep Passion for Teaching & Student Mentorship
points: Founder of ml0.ai ‚Äî lets anyone build AI models without writing code, democratizing AI for non-tech users.
Guided 150+ California schools in AI/STEM through Los Angeles Computing Circle (LACC).
Trainer for faculty dev programs at IIT Roorkee ‚Äî trusted mentor for top educators.
Author of 2 admission guidebooks ‚Äî helping Indian students get into top U.S. universities.
Tech advisor at SimpleMindSchool.com ‚Äî making complex tech easy to learn for beginners.

cta.title: Learn from a World-Class AI Expert
cta.description: Join Dr. Sandha's comprehensive AI program and gain insights from someone who has shaped the future of AI at the world's leading tech companies.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To create a vibrant ecosystem of AI innovation and digital excellence in Punjab, driving economic growth and improving the quality of life for citizens. We aim to foster collaboration between government, industry, academia, and the community to propel the state as a leader in AI advancements.
achievements: First AI Strategy for Punjab State launched
Skill development in partnership with PSEB and EdTech companies
Punjab Hackathon fostering innovation in AI solutions

events.heading: Explore Our Hosted Events
events.subheading: Join the events organized by us and engage with our community.

events.title: AI Orientation for B.Ed. Students (23 April)
events.description: Our team conducted another AI session for Bachelors of Education (B.Ed.) students at PAI-Excellence, introducing fundamentals and practical demonstrations.
events.moreInfo: This session included interactive Q&A, demonstrations using AI tools like ChatGPT, and activities aimed at sparking interest in AI-driven teaching methods.

events.title: Online AI Orientation for Akal Academy, 100+ Schools (21 April)
events.description: PAI-Excellence hosted a live online AI orientation for over 100 Akal Academy schools, attended by 15,000+ students.
events.moreInfo: It featured expert talks, real-time demonstrations of AI applications, and a roadmap for AI learning for school students.

events.title: Expert Session for Practical AI Students (29 March)
events.description: Dr. Sandeep Singh Sandha led an expert deep-dive session on GPU-accelerated AI for our Practical AI cohort, covering hands-on ML workflows.
events.moreInfo: Advanced topics like model tuning, AI ethics, and deployment were also covered in this interactive workshop.

events.title: In-person AI Orientation for Akal Academy Schools (7 April)
events.description: PAI-Excellence delivered in-person AI workshops across multiple Akal Academy campuses, giving students live coding demonstrations.
events.moreInfo: Hands-on activities helped students understand basic AI logic, and mentors answered questions related to AI career paths.

footer.description: Empowering innovation in AI excellence across Punjab and beyond.
